title: The Devil Is a Part-Timer! High School!, Vol. 1 - manga (The Devil Is a Part-Timer! High School!, 1)
description: In this spin-off of the popular novel series, the devil king Satan and hero Emilia are reincarnated after their terrible battle--as high school students in modern-day Japan! Add in the innocent Chiho, a fellow student with a crush on the former lord of darkness, and you've got a romantic comedy of epic proportions!
author: Satoshi Wagahara
